title: Bitcoin Drags Crypto Down
description: Market Overview The crypto market capitalisation fell to $3.91 trillion, down 2% in the past day and 3.5% from last week’s peak, as Bitcoin came under pressure following Friday’s surge. title: Crypto news today: Mutuum Finance (MUTM) sparks analyst buzz after Bitcoin (BTC) faces $800M in liquidations ahead of Jackson Hole
